text: Maria Mercedes Cagigas Amendo (born 15 August 1979) is a road cyclist from Spain. She represented her nation between 1997 and 2005 at the UCI Road World Championships. She also competed in the women's individual road race at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * profile at Procyclingstats.com Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish female cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Spain Category:Cyclists at the 2000 Summer Olympics
title: Maria Cagigas
